text: Approval for the boston scientific scimed maverick(tm) monorail(tm) percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty (ptca) catheter (9, 12, 25, and 30 mm lengths with balloon diameters of 2.0 - 4,0 mm in 1/4 mm increments, and 15 and 20 mm lengths with balloon diameters of 1.5 mm and 2.0 - 4.0 mm in 1/4 mm increments.  The maverick(tm) monorail ptca catheter is indicated for balloon dilatation of the stenotic portion of a coronary artery or bypass graft stenosis for the purpose of improving myocardial perfusion.  The maverick(tm) monorail ptca catheter (2.25 - 4.0 mm balloon diameters) is also indicated for the post-delivery expansion of balloon expandable stents.
